item.description:
Meet to discuss the feasibility of doing a renewable energy project.
The agenda of the meeting might be:
Is it feasible?
Is it worthwhile?
Who is interested in participating?
Develop an initial plan?

The proposed scope and benefits might be as follows:

Community Renewable Energy Project Planning

Scope

1. Locate site
2. Analyze payback
3. Find investors
4. Negotiate with contractors and suppliers
5. Manage installation

Benefits

1. Increase use of renewable energy
2. Increase domestic energy supply
3. Stimulate local economy
4. Provide experience to volunteers
item.name: Community Alternative Energy Project
